exercises.title: Is there an immediate effect on pectoralis minor length after performing a prone scapular retraction exercise using typical sets and repetitions in pain-free participants?
exercises.abstract: Pectoralis Minor (PM) length shortening may contribute to faulty scapular. kinematics and result in shoulder pathology.of the Study: To evaluate if a prone scapular retraction exercise will demonstrate an immediate lengthening of the pectoralis minor (PM) in healthy participants.50 healthy participants were measured to determine the length of their PM. The participants then performed three sets of 10 repetitions of a prone scapular retraction exercise. Next, the participants had their PM length measured again to see if there was an immediate change in PM length.PM length was not found to significantly lengthen immediately after the prone scapular retraction exercise. The mean PM length increased by 0.243 cm after the exercise but this was less than the MDC95 of 0.63 cm so the difference does not represent a real alteration in PM length.The hypothesis was that due to the theory of reciprocal inhibition, the PM would increase in length after the exercise. This study does not support this hypothesis. This study suggests that to improve PM length the PM needs to be subjected to more time at a lengthened position than what was afforded by our exercise.This study demonstrated that three sets of 10 repetitions of a prone scapular retraction exercise did not significantly change the PM length. If this exercise is being implemented to increase the PM length it should be used after a stretch of the PM.Copyright © 2024 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

steps: kinematics and result in shoulder pathology.of the Study: To evaluate if a prone scapular retraction exercise will demonstrate an immediate lengthening of the pectoralis minor (PM) in healthy participants.50 healthy participants were measured to determine the length of their PM
The participants then performed three sets of 10 repetitions of a prone scapular retraction exercise

Next, the participants had their PM length measured again to see if there was an immediate change in PM length.PM length was not found to significantly lengthen immediately after the prone scapular retraction exercise

The mean PM length increased by 0.243 cm after the exercise but this was less than the MDC95 of 0.63 cm so the difference does not represent a real alteration in PM length.The hypothesis was that due to the theory of reciprocal inhibition, the PM would increase in length after the exercise

This study suggests that to improve PM length the PM needs to be subjected to more time at a lengthened position than what was afforded by our exercise.This study demonstrated that three sets of 10 repetitions of a prone scapular retraction exercise did not significantly change the PM length
If this exercise is being implemented to increase the PM length it should be used after a stretch of the PM.Copyright © 2024 Elsevier Ltd

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근의 길이를 평가하기 위해 50명의 건강한 참가자들이 측정 후, 3세트 10회 반복의 엎드린 어깨 후퇴 운동을 수행하고, 운동 후 다시 대흉근 길이를 측정하여 즉각적인 변화가 있는지 확인함.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 운동 후 대흉근 길이가 평균 0.243cm 증가했으나, 이는 통계적으로 유의미한 변화가 아니며, 대흉근 길이를 늘리기 위해서는 더 오랜 시간 동안 늘어난 위치에 있어야 한다는 것을 제안함.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 50명의 건강한 참가자들로, 통증이 없는 상태에서 연구가 수행됨.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 바닥에 엎드린 자세로, 팔은 몸 옆에 두고 이마는 바닥에 대고 편안하게 놓음.
동작_단계: 1단계: 팔을 몸 옆에 두고 엎드린 자세를 유지합니다.
2단계: 어깨를 뒤로 당기며 가슴을 바닥에서 살짝 들어올립니다.
3단계: 팔꿈치를 구부려 팔을 몸 쪽으로 당깁니다.
4단계: 이 상태에서 5초간 유지합니다.
5단계: 천천히 원래 자세로 돌아옵니다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 가슴과 어깨 부위의 긴장이 느껴지며, 이완된 느낌이 들어야 함.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 통해 어깨가 뒤로 당겨진 모습과 가슴이 열리는 모습을 확인합니다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 자신의 유연성에 맞춰 팔을 당기는 정도를 조절합니다.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 1세트부터 시작하여 점차 세트를 늘려갑니다.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 앉아 있는 시간이 많은 직업군은 정기적으로 스트레칭을 통해 긴장을 풀어주는 것이 좋습니다.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중간중간 짧은 스트레칭 시간을 가지며, 점심시간에 추가적인 스트레칭을 포함합니다.

수행_시_주의점: 운동 전 충분한 준비 운동을 합니다.

exercises.title: Effects of scapulothoracic exercises on chest mobility, respiratory muscle strength, and pulmonary function in male COPD patients with forward shoulder posture: A randomized controlled trial.
exercises.abstract: Background The postural abnormality, forward shoulder posture (FSP), is the most common cause of respiratory impairment in older individuals with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). A recent study found that performing pectoral stretching and scapular strengthening exercises for eight weeks could reduce FSP in healthy participants. We aimed to determine the effects of pectoral stretching and scapular stabilizer strengthening exercises on FSP, chest wall mobility, respiratory muscle strength, and pulmonary function in male patients with COPD. Methods This study was randomized clinical trial. Forty male COPD patients with FSP aged 60-90 years were included and randomly allocated to control (n=20) and exercise (n=20) groups. Following completion of the scapulothoracic exercises (three days/week, for eight weeks), respiratory functions were assessed by measuring the magnitude of FSP, chest mobility, respiratory muscle strength, and pulmonary functions. Results FSP and thoracic kyphosis angle significantly decreased compared to controls (p<0.001, p<0.001). Middle and lower chest mobility markedly increased (p<0.001, p<0.001) and the pectoralis minor index significantly improved (p<0.001). The strength of the lower trapezius and serratus anterior muscles significantly increased at week eight of the exercise training (p<0.003, p<0.001). There was a marked increase in maximum inspiratory pressure and maximum expiratory pressure (p<0.001, p<0.001). Conclusions The eight-week combined pectoral muscles self-stretching and serratus anterior and lower trapezius strengthening exercises could be an effective treatment and/or prevention strategy for FSP reduction, leading to improved respiratory function in male COPD patients.Copyright: © 2024 Thongchote K et al.

steps: A recent study found that performing pectoral stretching and scapular strengthening exercises for eight weeks could reduce FSP in healthy participants

We aimed to determine the effects of pectoral stretching and scapular stabilizer strengthening exercises on FSP, chest wall mobility, respiratory muscle strength, and pulmonary function in male patients with COPD
Forty male COPD patients with FSP aged 60-90 years were included and randomly allocated to control (n=20) and exercise (n=20) groups

Following completion of the scapulothoracic exercises (three days/week, for eight weeks), respiratory functions were assessed by measuring the magnitude of FSP, chest mobility, respiratory muscle strength, and pulmonary functions
The strength of the lower trapezius and serratus anterior muscles significantly increased at week eight of the exercise training (p<0.003, p<0.001)

Conclusions The eight-week combined pectoral muscles self-stretching and serratus anterior and lower trapezius strengthening exercises could be an effective treatment and/or prevention strategy for FSP reduction, leading to improved respiratory function in male COPD patients.Copyright: © 2024 Thongchote K et al.

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근 스트레칭과 견갑 안정화 근육 강화 운동을 8주 동안 시행하여 FSP를 감소시키고, 가슴 이동성, 호흡 근력 및 폐 기능을 개선하는 방법.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 이 연구는 FSP와 흉추 후만 각도가 유의미하게 감소하고, 중간 및 하부 가슴 이동성이 증가하며, 호흡 근력이 향상되었음을 보여주었다.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 60-90세 남성 COPD 환자, FSP를 가진 40명.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양발을 어깨너비로 벌리고, 팔을 자연스럽게 옆으로 늘어뜨린 상태에서 서기.
동작_단계: 양팔을 천천히 옆으로 들어올리며, 손바닥이 하늘을 향하도록 한다.
팔을 위로 올리면서 가슴을 앞으로 내밀고, 어깨를 뒤로 젖힌다.
팔을 위로 올린 상태에서 5초간 정지한다.
팔을 천천히 내리며 원래 자세로 돌아간다.
이 동작을 10회 반복한다.
호흡_패턴: 팔을 들어올릴 때 깊게 숨을 들이마신다.
팔을 위로 올린 상태에서 숨을 참는다.
팔을 내릴 때 천천히 숨을 내쉰다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 가슴과 어깨 부위가 늘어나는 느낌과 함께 가벼운 긴장감.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 통해 팔의 위치와 어깨의 정렬을 확인하며, 어깨가 귀에 가까워지지 않도록 주의한다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 중 불편함이 느껴지지 않도록 강도를 조절.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 5회 반복 후 점차 10회로 증가.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 1시간마다 스트레칭 시간을 갖도록 권장.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중간에 짧은 스트레칭 시간을 포함하여 통합.

수행_시_주의점: 스트레칭 중 호흡이 불규칙해지지 않도록 주의.

exercises.title: Comparison of Supervised versus Self-Administered Stretching on Bench Press Maximal Strength and Force Development.
exercises.abstract: While there is reported superior effectiveness with supervised training, it usually requires specialized exercise facilities and instructors. It is reported in the literature that high-volume stretching improves pectoralis muscles strength under supervised conditions while practical relevance is discussed. Therefore, the study objective was to compare the effects of volume equated, supervised- and self-administered home-based stretching on strength performance.Sixty-three recreational participants were equally assigned to either a supervised static stretching, home-based stretching, or control group. The effects of 15 min pectoralis stretching, 4 days per week for 8 weeks, were assessed on dynamic and isometric bench press strength and force development.While there was a large magnitude maximal strength increase (p < 0.001-0.023, ƞ2 = 0.118-0.351), force development remained unaffected. Dynamic maximal strength in both groups demonstrated large magnitude increases compared to the control group (p < 0.001-0.001, d = 1.227-0.905). No differences between the intervention group for maximal strength (p = 0.518-0.821, d = 0.101-0.322) could be detected.The results could potentially be attributed to stretch-induced tension (mechanical overload) with subsequent anabolic adaptations, and alternative explanatory approaches are discussed. Nevertheless, home-based stretching seems a practical alternative to supervised training with potential meaningful applications in different settings.

steps: While there is reported superior effectiveness with supervised training, it usually requires specialized exercise facilities and instructors
It is reported in the literature that high-volume stretching improves pectoralis muscles strength under supervised conditions while practical relevance is discussed

Therefore, the study objective was to compare the effects of volume equated, supervised- and self-administered home-based stretching on strength performance.Sixty-three recreational participants were equally assigned to either a supervised static stretching, home-based stretching, or control group

The effects of 15 min pectoralis stretching, 4 days per week for 8 weeks, were assessed on dynamic and isometric bench press strength and force development.While there was a large magnitude maximal strength increase (p < 0.001-0.023, ƞ2 = 0.118-0.351), force development remained unaffected

No differences between the intervention group for maximal strength (p = 0.518-0.821, d = 0.101-0.322) could be detected.The results could potentially be attributed to stretch-induced tension (mechanical overload) with subsequent anabolic adaptations, and alternative explanatory approaches are discussed
Nevertheless, home-based stretching seems a practical alternative to supervised training with potential meaningful applications in different settings.

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근을 대상으로 한 15분의 정적 스트레칭을 주 4회, 8주 동안 실시하여 최대 근력과 힘 발달에 미치는 영향을 비교.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 고용량 스트레칭이 대흉근의 근력 향상에 효과적이며, 자가 관리 스트레칭이 감독 하의 스트레칭과 유사한 효과를 보임.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 63명의 레크리에이션 참가자를 대상으로 하여, 감독 하의 스트레칭, 자가 관리 스트레칭, 대조군으로 나누어 진행.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양팔을 옆으로 벌리고 손바닥이 천장을 향하도록 서거나 앉는다.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 천천히 뒤로 젖히며 가슴을 펴고, 이때 어깨를 아래로 내린다.
2단계: 팔을 최대한 뒤로 젖히며 15초간 유지한다.
3단계: 팔을 원래 위치로 돌아오면서 숨을 내쉰다.
4단계: 다시 1단계로 돌아가 반복한다.
5단계: 8주 동안 주 4회 반복하며 점진적으로 스트레칭 범위를 늘린다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 가슴과 어깨 부위에서의 긴장감과 이완감을 느껴야 하며, 통증이 아닌 편안한 스트레칭 느낌을 유지해야 한다.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 통해 어깨가 아래로 내려가고 가슴이 펴진 모습을 확인하며 자세를 교정한다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 범위를 점진적으로 늘리며 불편함이 없도록 조절한다.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자부터 시작하여 점차적으로 스트레칭의 범위와 강도를 늘려간다.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 짧은 휴식 시간에 스트레칭을 실시하여 긴장 완화.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중간 중간에 스트레칭 시간을 가지며, 일상 속에서 간단한 스트레칭을 통합한다.

수행_시_주의점: 자세를 유지할 때 과도한 힘을 주지 않는다.

exercises.title: Efficacy of trigger point injection therapy in noncardiac chest pain: A randomized controlled trial.
exercises.abstract: This study aimed to compare the effects of trigger point injections and stretching exercises in patients with noncardiac chest pain (NCCP) associated with myofascial pain syndrome.This prospective randomized controlled trial included 50 patients with noncardiac chest pain and trigger points in the pectoralis muscles between October 2019 and June 2020. The patients were randomly assigned to receive trigger point injections into the pectoralis muscles and exercise (n=25; 15 males, 10 females; mean age: 42.8±9.2 years; range, 25 to 57 years) or only perform exercise (n=25; 11 males, 14 females; mean age: 41.8±11.2 years; range, 18 to 60 years). The primary outcome was pain intensity at the first month and three months after the first treatment session, measured using the Visual Analog Scale from 0 to 100. The secondary outcome was the Nottingham Health Profile score.Treatment with stretching exercises and trigger point injection resulted in significant pain reduction compared to stretching exercises alone, and the reduction was persistent at the three-month follow-up (p<0.001). A between-group comparison showed no significant difference in the Nottingham Health Profile (p=0.522). Complications related to the procedure or severe adverse events attributable to treatment were not reported.Trigger point injection combined with stretching exercises is an efficient treatment for noncardiac chest pain related to myofascial pain syndrome compared to exercise treatment alone.Copyright © 2024, Turkish Society of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation.

steps: This study aimed to compare the effects of trigger point injections and stretching exercises in patients with noncardiac chest pain (NCCP) associated with myofascial pain syndrome.This prospective randomized controlled trial included 50 patients with noncardiac chest pain and trigger points in the pectoralis muscles between October 2019 and June 2020

The patients were randomly assigned to receive trigger point injections into the pectoralis muscles and exercise (n=25; 15 males, 10 females; mean age: 42.8±9.2 years; range, 25 to 57 years) or only perform exercise (n=25; 11 males, 14 females; mean age: 41.8±11.2 years; range, 18 to 60 years)

The secondary outcome was the Nottingham Health Profile score.Treatment with stretching exercises and trigger point injection resulted in significant pain reduction compared to stretching exercises alone, and the reduction was persistent at the three-month follow-up (p<0.001)

Complications related to the procedure or severe adverse events attributable to treatment were not reported.Trigger point injection combined with stretching exercises is an efficient treatment for noncardiac chest pain related to myofascial pain syndrome compared to exercise treatment alone.Copyright © 2024, Turkish Society of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation.

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 논문에서는 대흉근의 트리거 포인트에 대한 주사 요법과 스트레칭 운동의 효과를 비교하였으며, 스트레칭 운동은 대흉근의 유연성을 증가시키고 통증을 완화하는 데 도움을 주었다고 설명하고 있습니다.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 스트레칭 운동과 트리거 포인트 주사 치료를 병행한 그룹이 스트레칭 운동만 수행한 그룹에 비해 통증 감소가 유의미하게 나타났으며, 이 효과는 3개월 후에도 지속되었다고 보고되었습니다.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 비심장성 흉통(NCCP)과 근막통증증후군이 있는 50명의 환자를 대상으로 하였으며, 이들은 대흉근에 트리거 포인트가 있는 것으로 확인되었습니다.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양팔을 옆으로 벌리고 손바닥이 하늘을 향하도록 서서 대흉근을 이완합니다.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 천천히 위로 올리며 가슴을 펴고, 5초간 유지합니다.
2단계: 양팔을 뒤로 젖히며 어깨를 아래로 내리고, 5초간 유지합니다.
3단계: 양팔을 앞으로 모으며 가슴을 움켜잡듯이 하고, 5초간 유지합니다.
4단계: 양팔을 다시 옆으로 벌리며 가슴을 앞으로 내밀고, 5초간 유지합니다.
5단계: 양팔을 천천히 내리며 원래 자세로 돌아옵니다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 가슴과 어깨 부위의 이완감과 스트레칭을 느껴야 하며, 통증이 아닌 시원함을 느껴야 합니다.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 보며 팔의 위치와 어깨의 상태를 확인하여 올바른 자세를 유지합니다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 통증이 느껴지지 않을 정도로 조절
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 기본 동작부터 시작하여 점차적으로 강도를 높입니다.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 정기적으로 스트레칭 시간을 가지며, 컴퓨터 작업 중간에 짧은 스트레칭을 포함합니다.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 일상적인 활동 중 짧은 스트레칭을 포함하여, 특히 장시간 앉아 있는 경우 자주 수행합니다.

수행_시_주의점: 스트레칭 시 과도한 힘을 주지 않기

통증_강도별_권장_변형.7-10: 전문가의 지도 하에 스트레칭 및 물리치료

exercises.title: Influence of 8-weeks of supervised static stretching or resistance training of pectoral major muscles on maximal strength, muscle thickness and range of motion.
exercises.abstract: Current research suggests static stretch-induced maximal strength increases and muscle hypertrophy with potential to substitute resistance-training routines. However, most studies investigated the plantar flexors. This study explored the effects of a static stretching program on maximal strength, hypertrophy and flexibility of the pectoralis major and compared the effects with those of traditional resistance training.Eighty-one (81) active participants were allocated to either a static stretching, strength-training or control group. Pectoralis stretching was applied 15 min/day, 4 days per week for 8 weeks, while resistance training trained 3 days per week, 5 × 12 repetitions.There was an increase in all parameters (strength: p < 0.001, ƞ2 = 0.313, muscle thickness: p < 0.001, ƞ2 = 0.157-0.264, flexibility: p < 0.001, ƞ2 = 0.316) and a time*group interaction (strength: p = 0.001, ƞ2 = 0.154, muscle thickness: p = 0.008-0.001, ƞ2 = 0.117-0.173, flexibility: p < 0.001, ƞ2 = 0.267). Post-hoc testing showed no difference between both intervention groups regarding maximal strength and muscle thickness (p = 0.905-0.983, d = 0.036-0.087), while flexibility increased in the stretching group (p = 0.001, d = 0.789).Stretching showed increases in maximal strength and hypertrophy, which were comparable with commonly used resistance training. Based on current literature, the influence of mechanical tension as the underlying mechanism is discussed. Furthermore, as equipment and comparatively long stretching durations are requested to induce meaningful strength increases in recreationally active participants, practical application seems limited to special circumstances.© 2024. The Author(s).

steps: Current research suggests static stretch-induced maximal strength increases and muscle hypertrophy with potential to substitute resistance-training routines

Pectoralis stretching was applied 15 min/day, 4 days per week for 8 weeks, while resistance training trained 3 days per week, 5 × 12 repetitions.There was an increase in all parameters (strength: p < 0.001, ƞ2 = 0.313, muscle thickness: p < 0.001, ƞ2 = 0.157-0.264, flexibility: p < 0.001, ƞ2 = 0.316) and a time*group interaction (strength: p = 0.001, ƞ2 = 0.154, muscle thickness: p = 0.008-0.001, ƞ2 = 0.117-0.173, flexibility: p < 0.001, ƞ2 = 0.267)

Post-hoc testing showed no difference between both intervention groups regarding maximal strength and muscle thickness (p = 0.905-0.983, d = 0.036-0.087), while flexibility increased in the stretching group (p = 0.001, d = 0.789).Stretching showed increases in maximal strength and hypertrophy, which were comparable with commonly used resistance training

Furthermore, as equipment and comparatively long stretching durations are requested to induce meaningful strength increases in recreationally active participants, practical application seems limited to special circumstances.© 2024

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근을 대상으로 한 정적 스트레칭 프로그램은 주 4회, 하루 15분 동안 8주간 실시되었으며, 근력, 근육 두께 및 유연성의 변화를 관찰하였다.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 정적 스트레칭이 최대 근력과 근육 비대에 긍정적인 영향을 미치며, 전통적인 저항 훈련과 유사한 효과를 나타냈다는 연구 결과가 있다.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 81명의 활동적인 참가자들이 정적 스트레칭 그룹, 저항 훈련 그룹, 대조군으로 나뉘어 연구가 진행되었다.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양팔을 양옆으로 벌리고, 손바닥이 하늘을 향하도록 서서 대흉근이 긴장되지 않도록 편안한 자세를 유지한다.
동작_단계: 1단계: 두 팔을 천천히 위로 들어올리며 대흉근이 늘어나는 것을 느낀다.
2단계: 팔을 옆으로 벌리면서 가슴을 앞으로 밀어내어 스트레칭을 강화한다.
3단계: 팔을 뒤로 당기며 가슴을 앞으로 내밀어 더 깊은 스트레칭을 시도한다.
4단계: 팔을 다시 위로 올리면서 깊게 숨을 들이마신다.
5단계: 팔을 원래의 시작 자세로 돌아오며 숨을 내쉰다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 가슴과 어깨 부위가 부드럽게 늘어나는 느낌과 함께 긴장이 풀리는 것을 느껴야 한다.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 보며 팔의 위치와 자세를 확인하고, 어깨가 올라가지 않도록 주의한다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 강도를 조절하기 위해 팔을 벌리는 정도를 조절한다.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 1단계부터 시작하여 점진적으로 5단계까지 진행한다.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 짧은 휴식 시간에 스트레칭을 실시하여 긴장된 근육을 이완시킨다.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중간에 5분씩 스트레칭을 포함하여 일상적으로 통합한다.

수행_시_주의점: 무리한 스트레칭은 피하고, 통증이 느껴지면 즉시 중단한다.
스트레칭 중 호흡을 잊지 않도록 한다.

exercises.title: Effects of a Home-Based Stretching Program on Bench Press Maximum Strength and Shoulder Flexibility.
exercises.abstract: Recent research showed significant stretch-mediated maximum strength increases when performing stretching between 5 to 120 minutes per day with the calf muscle. However, since the practical applicability of these long stretching durations was questioned and studies exploring the transferability to the upper body are scarce, the aim of this study was to investigate the possibility of using a home-based stretching program to induce significant increases in maximum strength and flexibility. Therefore, 31 recreationally active participants (intervention group: 18, control group: 13) stretched the pectoralis major for 15min/day for eight weeks, incorporating three different stretching exercises. The maximum strength was tested isometrically and dynamically in the bench press (one-repetition maximum: 1RM) as well as shoulder range of motion (ROM) performing bilateral shoulder rotation with a scaled bar. Using a two-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) with repeated measures, the results showed high magnitude Time effects (ƞ² = 0.388-0.582, p < 0.001) and Group*Time interaction (ƞ² = 0.281-0.53, p < 0.001-0.002), with increases of 7.4 ± 5.6% in 1RM and of 9.8 ± 5.0% in ROM test in the intervention group. In the isometric testing, there was a high-magnitude Time effect (ƞ² = 0.271, p = 0.003), however, the Group*Time interaction failed to reach significance (p = 0.75). The results are in line with previous results that showed stretch-mediated maximum strength increases in the lower extremity. Future research should address the underlying physiological mechanisms such as muscle hypertrophy, contraction conditions as well as pointing out the relevance of intensity, training frequency and stretching duration.© Journal of Sports Science and Medicine.

Therefore, 31 recreationally active participants (intervention group: 18, control group: 13) stretched the pectoralis major for 15min/day for eight weeks, incorporating three different stretching exercises
The results are in line with previous results that showed stretch-mediated maximum strength increases in the lower extremity

Future research should address the underlying physiological mechanisms such as muscle hypertrophy, contraction conditions as well as pointing out the relevance of intensity, training frequency and stretching duration.© Journal of Sports Science and Medicine.

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근을 대상으로 한 15분/일의 스트레칭 프로그램을 8주 동안 실시하여 최대 근력과 유연성 향상을 목표로 함.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 이 연구는 스트레칭이 최대 근력과 유연성을 증가시킬 수 있다는 것을 보여주며, 특히 대흉근에 대한 스트레칭이 효과적임을 입증함.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 31명의 레크리에이션 활동 참가자(중재 그룹 18명, 대조 그룹 13명)로 구성됨.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양팔을 옆으로 벌리고, 손바닥이 하늘을 향하도록 서거나 앉아 있음.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 옆으로 벌린 상태에서 시작.
2단계: 양팔을 천천히 위로 올리며 대흉근을 늘림.
3단계: 팔을 머리 위로 올린 상태에서 5초간 유지.
4단계: 팔을 천천히 내리며 대흉근을 이완.
5단계: 팔을 다시 옆으로 벌리고 반복.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 대흉근이 늘어나는 느낌과 함께 가벼운 긴장감을 느껴야 함.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 보며 팔의 위치와 자세를 확인.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 느끼는 긴장감을 기준으로 조절.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자: 5회 반복 → 중급자: 10회 반복 → 고급자: 15회 반복.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실이나 집에서 간단히 수행 가능하며, 중간에 짬을 내어 스트레칭.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중간에 5분씩 스트레칭 시간을 가지도록 계획.

exercises.title: Modern Treatment of Neurogenic Thoracic Outlet Syndrome: Pathoanatomy, Diagnosis, and Arthroscopic Surgical Technique.
exercises.abstract: Compressive pathology in the supraclavicular and infraclavicular fossae is broadly termed "thoracic outlet syndrome," with the large majority being neurogenic in nature. These are challenging conditions for patients and physicians and require robust knowledge of thoracic outlet anatomy and scapulothoracic kinematics to elucidate neurogenic versus vascular disorders. The combination of repetitive overhead activity and scapular dyskinesia leads to contracture of the scalene muscles, subclavius, and pectoralis minor, creating a chronically distalized and protracted scapular posture. This decreases the volume of the scalene triangle, costoclavicular space, and retropectoralis minor space, with resultant compression of the brachial plexus causing neurogenic thoracic outlet syndrome. This pathologic cascade leading to neurogenic thoracic outlet syndrome is termed pectoralis minor syndrome when primary symptoms localize to the infraclavicular area. Making the correct diagnosis is challenging and requires the combination of complete history, physical examination, advanced imaging, and ultrasound-guided injections. Most patients improve with nonsurgical treatment incorporating pectoralis minor stretching and periscapular and postural retraining. Surgical decompression of the thoracic outlet is reserved for compliant patients who fail nonsurgical management and respond favorably to targeted injections. In addition to prior exclusively open procedures with supraclavicular, infraclavicular, and/or transaxillary approaches, new minimally invasive and targeted endoscopic techniques have been developed over the past decade. They involve the endoscopic release of the pectoralis minor tendon, with additional suprascapular nerve release, brachial plexus neurolysis, and subclavius and interscalene release depending on the preoperative work-up.© 2022 The Authors.

steps: Most patients improve with nonsurgical treatment incorporating pectoralis minor stretching and periscapular and postural retraining

논문_분석.주요_발견사항: 신경성 흉곽 출구 증후군은 주로 경추부와 흉부의 압박 병리로 인해 발생하며, 스칼레인 근육과 소흉근의 경직이 주요 원인이다.
논문_분석.관련_근육_기능: 대흉근은 팔을 들어올리고, 가슴을 확장하며, 어깨를 안정화하는 역할을 한다.
논문_분석.관련_증상_패턴: 라운드 숄더, 거북목, 가슴 통증, 팔의 저림 및 통증.
논문_분석.잠재적_개입_지점: 소흉근 및 대흉근의 스트레칭과 어깨 및 자세 교정.

권장_스트레칭_프로토콜.스트레칭_목적: 대흉근의 긴장을 완화하고, 어깨의 가동성을 향상시키며, 통증을 감소시키기 위함.
권장_스트레칭_프로토콜.시작_자세: 서거나 앉은 자세에서 양팔을 옆으로 벌리고, 손바닥이 위를 향하게 한다.
동작_단계: 1. 양팔을 천천히 옆으로 벌려 가슴을 열어준다.
2. 양팔을 위로 올려 머리 위에서 손을 맞잡는다.
3. 팔을 뒤로 젖혀 가슴을 앞으로 밀어준다.
4. 15-30초 동안 이 자세를 유지하며 깊게 호흡한다.
5. 천천히 시작 자세로 돌아온다.
권장_스트레칭_프로토콜.근거_설명: 논문에서 언급된 바와 같이, 대흉근과 소흉근의 경직이 신경성 흉곽 출구 증후군을 유발하므로, 이 근육들을 스트레칭함으로써 증상을 완화할 수 있다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 불편함을 느끼지 않는 범위 내에서 강도를 조절한다.
실행_가이드라인.주의사항: 통증이 심해지거나 불편함이 느껴질 경우 즉시 중단하고 전문가와 상담한다.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 장시간 앉아 있는 환경에서 정기적으로 스트레칭을 실시하여 근육 긴장을 완화한다.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 일상적인 활동 중에도 스트레칭을 자주 포함시켜 근육의 긴장을 예방한다.

수행_시_주의점: 스트레칭 중 과도한 통증이 느껴지지 않도록 주의한다.
부상 이력이 있는 경우 전문가와 상담 후 진행한다.

exercises.title: Assessing shoulder muscle stretch reflexes following breast cancer treatment and postmastectomy breast reconstruction.
exercises.abstract: Muscle stiffness is altered following postmastectomy breast reconstruction and breast cancer treatment. The exact mechanisms underlying these alterations are unknown; however, muscle stretch reflexes may play a role. This work examined short- (SLR) and long-latency (LLR) shoulder muscle stretch reflexes in breast cancer survivors. Forty-nine patients who had undergone postmastectomy breast reconstruction, 17 who had undergone chemoradiation, and 18 healthy, age-matched controls were enrolled. Muscle activity was recorded from the clavicular and sternocostal regions of the pectoralis major and anterior, middle, and posterior deltoids during vertical ab/adduction or horizontal flex/extension perturbations while participants maintained minimal torques. SLR and LLR were quantified for each muscle. Our major finding was that following postmastectomy breast reconstruction, SLR and LLR are impaired in the clavicular region of the pectoralis major. Individuals who had chemoradiation had impaired stretch reflexes in the clavicular and sternocostal region of the pectoralis major, anterior, middle, and posterior deltoid. These findings indicate that breast cancer treatments alter the regulation of shoulder muscle stretch reflexes and may be associated with surgical or nonsurgical damage to the pectoral fascia, muscle spindles, and/or sensory Ia afferents.NEW & NOTEWORTHY Shoulder muscle stretch reflexes may be impacted following postmastectomy breast reconstruction and chemoradiation. Here, we examined short- and long-latency shoulder muscle stretch reflexes in two experiments following common breast reconstruction procedures and chemoradiation. We show impairments in pectoralis major stretch reflexes following postmastectomy breast reconstruction and pectoralis major and deltoid muscle stretch reflexes following chemoradiation. These findings indicate that breast cancer treatments alter the regulation of shoulder muscle stretch reflexes.

Individuals who had chemoradiation had impaired stretch reflexes in the clavicular and sternocostal region of the pectoralis major, anterior, middle, and posterior deltoid

These findings indicate that breast cancer treatments alter the regulation of shoulder muscle stretch reflexes and may be associated with surgical or nonsurgical damage to the pectoral fascia, muscle spindles, and/or sensory Ia afferents.NEW & NOTEWORTHY Shoulder muscle stretch reflexes may be impacted following postmastectomy breast reconstruction and chemoradiation
Here, we examined short- and long-latency shoulder muscle stretch reflexes in two experiments following common breast reconstruction procedures and chemoradiation

These findings indicate that breast cancer treatments alter the regulation of shoulder muscle stretch reflexes.

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 이 연구는 유방암 생존자에서 대흉근과 삼각근의 단기 및 장기 지연 근육 신전 반사를 평가하였다.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 유방암 치료 후 대흉근의 신전 반사가 손상되며, 이는 수술적 또는 비수술적 손상과 관련이 있을 수 있다.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 유방 절제술 후 재건 수술을 받은 49명의 환자, 화학 방사선 치료를 받은 17명, 건강한 18명의 연령대가 일치하는 대조군.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양팔을 옆으로 벌리고 어깨 높이에서 수평으로 유지한다.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 천천히 위로 올리며 어깨를 펴준다.
2단계: 팔을 수평으로 유지한 채로 가슴을 앞으로 밀어준다.
3단계: 팔을 뒤로 젖히며 가슴을 열어준다.
4단계: 팔을 아래로 내리며 어깨를 이완시킨다.
5단계: 원래 자세로 돌아오며 깊게 호흡한다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 어깨와 가슴 부위의 이완감과 스트레칭을 느껴야 한다.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 사용하여 팔의 위치와 어깨의 정렬을 확인한다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 불편함이 느껴지지 않는 범위에서 강도를 조절
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 동작을 천천히 진행하고, 고급자는 동작의 범위를 넓혀 진행

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 장시간 앉아 있는 경우, 스트레칭을 통해 어깨와 가슴의 긴장을 완화할 수 있다.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중간중간 짧은 스트레칭 시간을 가지며 통합할 수 있다.

exercises.title: Kinematics and muscle activation in subacromial pain syndrome patients and asymptomatic controls.
exercises.abstract: Conflicting theories exist about the underlying cause of chronic subacromial pain in the middle-aged population. We aim to improve our understanding of kinematics and muscle activation in subacromial pain syndrome to provide insight in its pathophysiology.In a cross-sectional comparison of 40 patients with subacromial pain syndrome and 30 asymptomatic controls, three-dimensional shoulder kinematics and electromyography-based co-contraction in 10 shoulder muscles were independently recorded. Glenohumeral and scapulothoracic kinematics were evaluated during abduction and forward flexion. Co-contraction was expressed as an activation ratio, specifying the relative agonistic and antagonistic muscle activity in each muscle.During abduction and forward flexion, the contribution of glenohumeral motion to elevation and glenohumeral external rotation was lower in subacromial pain syndrome (at 1200 abduction: -9°, 95% CI -14°- -3°; and - 8°, 95% CI -13°--3°, respectively), and was compensated by more scapulothoracic motion. The pectoralis major's activation ratio was significantly lower (Z-score: -2.657, P = 0.008) and teres major's activation ratio significantly higher (Z-score: -4.088, P < 0.001) in patients with subacromial pain syndrome compared to the control group.Reduced glenohumeral elevation and external rotation in subacromial pain syndrome coincided with less teres major antagonistic activity during elevation. These biomechanical findings provide a scientific basis for intervention studies directed at stretching exercises to reduce glenohumeral stiffness in the treatment of subacromial pain syndrome, and teres major strengthening to improve humeral head depressor function.Copyright © 2021. Published by Elsevier Ltd.

steps: These biomechanical findings provide a scientific basis for intervention studies directed at stretching exercises to reduce glenohumeral stiffness in the treatment of subacromial pain syndrome, and teres major strengthening to improve humeral head depressor function.Copyright © 2021

논문_분석.주요_발견사항: 대흉근의 활성화 비율이 낮고, 대원근의 활성화 비율이 높아져 어깨의 운동 범위가 감소함.
논문_분석.관련_근육_기능: 대흉근은 팔을 앞으로 들어올리는 데 중요한 역할을 하며, 대원근은 팔을 아래로 눌러주는 기능을 수행.
논문_분석.관련_증상_패턴: 라운드숄더, 거북목, 가슴 통증이 자주 발생.
논문_분석.잠재적_개입_지점: 어깨의 유연성을 증가시키고 대흉근의 긴장을 완화하기 위한 스트레칭.

권장_스트레칭_프로토콜.스트레칭_목적: 대흉근의 유연성을 증가시키고 어깨의 운동 범위를 개선하여 통증을 감소시키기 위함.
권장_스트레칭_프로토콜.시작_자세: 양 발을 어깨 너비로 벌리고, 팔을 옆으로 쭉 뻗어 몸의 측면과 평행하게 유지.
동작_단계: 1. 양팔을 천천히 뒤로 이동하여 가슴을 열어줍니다.
2. 팔이 최대한 뒤로 가도록 하여 대흉근이 늘어나는 느낌을 느낍니다.
3. 이 자세를 유지하며 깊게 호흡합니다.
4. 15-30초 동안 이 자세를 유지합니다.
5. 천천히 원래 자세로 돌아옵니다.
권장_스트레칭_프로토콜.근거_설명: 대흉근의 활성화 비율이 낮아지면서 어깨의 운동 범위가 감소하므로, 스트레칭을 통해 유연성을 증가시켜 통증을 완화할 수 있음.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 중 불편함이 느껴지지 않도록 조절.
실행_가이드라인.주의사항: 어깨에 통증이 심한 경우 즉시 중단하고 전문가와 상담.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 정기적으로 스트레칭 시간을 갖도록 권장.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 일상적인 활동 중 짧은 스트레칭 시간을 포함하여 근육 긴장을 완화.

금기사항: 어깨 관절 수술 후 회복 중
수행_시_주의점: 스트레칭 중 통증이 느껴지면 즉시 중단
부드럽게 움직이며 과도한 힘을 주지 않기

exercises.title: Acute and Prolonged Effects of Stretching on Shear Modulus of the Pectoralis Minor Muscle.
exercises.abstract: Increased muscle stiffness of the pectoralis minor (PMi) could deteriorate shoulder function. Stretching is useful for maintaining and improving muscle stiffness in rehabilitation and sport practice. However, the acute and prolonged effect of stretching on the PMi muscle stiffness is unclear due to limited methodology for assessing individual muscle stiffness. Using shear wave elastography, we explored the responses of shear modulus to stretching in the PMi over time. The first experiment (n = 20) aimed to clarify the acute change in the shear modulus during stretching. The shear modulus was measured at intervals of 30 s × 10 sets. The second experiment (n = 16) aimed to observe and compare the prolonged effect of different durations of stretching on the shear modulus. Short and long stretching duration groups underwent 30s × 1 set and 30s × 10 sets, respectively. The assessments of shear modulus were conducted before, immediately after, and at 5, 10, and 15 min post-stretching. In experiment I, the shear modulus decreased immediately after a bout (30 s) of stretching (p < 0.001, change: -2.3 kPa, effect size: r = 0.72) and further decreased after 3 repetitions (i.e., 90 s) of stretching (p = 0.03, change: -1.0 kPa, effect size: r = 0.53). In experiment II, the change in the shear modulus after stretching was greater in the long duration group than in the short duration group (p = 0.013, group mean difference: -2.5 kPa, partial η2 = 0.36). The shear modulus of PMi decreased immediately after stretching, and stretching for a long duration was promising to maintain the decreased shear modulus. The acute and prolonged effects on the PMi shear modulus provide information relevant to minimum and persistent stretching time in rehabilitation and sport practice.© Journal of Sports Science and Medicine.

steps: Stretching is useful for maintaining and improving muscle stiffness in rehabilitation and sport practice
However, the acute and prolonged effect of stretching on the PMi muscle stiffness is unclear due to limited methodology for assessing individual muscle stiffness
Using shear wave elastography, we explored the responses of shear modulus to stretching in the PMi over time
The first experiment (n = 20) aimed to clarify the acute change in the shear modulus during stretching
The second experiment (n = 16) aimed to observe and compare the prolonged effect of different durations of stretching on the shear modulus
Short and long stretching duration groups underwent 30s × 1 set and 30s × 10 sets, respectively
The assessments of shear modulus were conducted before, immediately after, and at 5, 10, and 15 min post-stretching

In experiment I, the shear modulus decreased immediately after a bout (30 s) of stretching (p < 0.001, change: -2.3 kPa, effect size: r = 0.72) and further decreased after 3 repetitions (i.e., 90 s) of stretching (p = 0.03, change: -1.0 kPa, effect size: r = 0.53)

In experiment II, the change in the shear modulus after stretching was greater in the long duration group than in the short duration group (p = 0.013, group mean difference: -2.5 kPa, partial η2 = 0.36)
The shear modulus of PMi decreased immediately after stretching, and stretching for a long duration was promising to maintain the decreased shear modulus

The acute and prolonged effects on the PMi shear modulus provide information relevant to minimum and persistent stretching time in rehabilitation and sport practice.© Journal of Sports Science and Medicine.

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근의 근육 강성을 유지하고 개선하기 위해 스트레칭의 급성 및 지속적인 효과를 조사한 연구로, 30초 스트레칭을 1세트와 30초 스트레칭을 10세트 수행하여 근육 강성 변화를 측정함.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 스트레칭 후 대흉근의 전단 모듈러스가 즉시 감소하며, 긴 스트레칭이 단기적으로 더 큰 감소 효과를 보임. 이는 재활 및 스포츠 실천에서 최소 및 지속적인 스트레칭 시간이 중요함을 시사함.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 20명의 참가자(실험 I)와 16명의 참가자(실험 II)로 구성된 연구로, 대흉근의 근육 강성을 평가하기 위해 전단파 엘라스토그래피를 사용함.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양팔을 옆으로 벌리고, 어깨를 편안하게 유지하며 서 있는 자세.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 천천히 위로 올리며 가슴을 펴고, 30초간 유지.
2단계: 팔을 옆으로 벌리며 가슴을 앞으로 밀어내듯이 스트레칭, 30초간 유지.
3단계: 한쪽 팔을 뒤로 쭉 뻗으며 반대쪽 팔로 가슴을 감싸듯이 잡아당김, 30초간 유지.
4단계: 두 팔을 뒤로 교차하여 손을 잡고 가슴을 앞으로 밀어내며 스트레칭, 30초간 유지.
5단계: 팔을 머리 위로 올리고, 몸을 옆으로 기울이며 측면 스트레칭, 양쪽 각각 30초간 유지.
호흡_패턴: 2단계: 들이쉬며 팔을 벌리고, 내쉬며 가슴을 앞으로 밀기.
3단계: 들이쉬며 팔을 뒤로 뻗고, 내쉬며 가슴을 감싸기.
4단계: 들이쉬며 팔을 뒤로 교차하고, 내쉬며 가슴을 밀기.
5단계: 들이쉬며 팔을 올리고, 내쉬며 몸을 기울이기.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 가슴과 어깨 부위의 긴장감이 풀리며, 스트레칭 시 시원함과 편안함을 느껴야 함.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 보며 어깨와 팔의 위치를 확인하고, 가슴이 열리는 느낌을 시각적으로 인지.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 느끼는 긴장감을 기준으로 조절, 불편함이 없도록 조정.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 1세트부터 시작하여 점진적으로 세트를 늘려 고급자로 진행.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 장시간 앉아 있을 때 중간중간 스트레칭을 통해 긴장을 풀도록 권장.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 일상적인 업무 중 1시간마다 짧은 스트레칭 시간을 가지도록 계획.

수행_시_주의점: 무리한 스트레칭은 피하고, 통증이 느껴지면 즉시 중단.
호흡을 잊지 말고, 긴장을 풀어야 함.
스트레칭 중 자세를 유지하며 균형을 잡아야 함.

통증_강도별_권장_변형.7-10: 전문가의 도움을 받거나 가벼운 스트레칭으로 조정

exercises.title: The Surfer's Shoulder: A Systematic Review of Current Literature and Potential Pathophysiological Explanations of Chronic Shoulder Complaints in Wave Surfers.
exercises.abstract: Wave surfing will debut in the next Olympic Games and is increasingly popular as a sport. Chronic shoulder complaints are frequently reported amongst surfers, though literature researching its pathophysiology and prevention is scarce. This article provides an overview of the current literature, proposes a potential pathogenesis and a potential physiotherapeutic prevention program for surf-induced shoulder complaints.A systematic review was performed considering the Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses (PRISMA) guidelines for articles regarding kinematic analysis of the surf paddling movement. Data sources were Embase, MEDLINE (PubMed) and Research gate. We included case series and cohort studies that originally studied or described the paddle movement made by wave surfers, studies that reported on kinesiologic analysis with nerve conduction studies and studies on 3D motion analysis of the shoulder while paddling.Eight original articles were included that analysed the shoulder movement in paddling surfers. Muscles that are active during paddling are mainly internal rotators and muscles that are involved in shoulder flexion. Internal rotators are active in propelling the surfer through the water, though external rotator strength is only used while the arm is out of the water.In surfers with shoulder complaints, external rotation range of motion and external rotation strength are impaired. Scapulothoracic dyskinesis may occur and subacromial pain syndrome may coincide. Further research should address potential pectoralis minor shortening, which may lead to aberrant scapular tilt and lateral rotation of the scapula. The surfer's shoulder is characterised by external rotation deficit, as opposed to internal rotation deficit in the thrower's shoulder, and it differs substantially from shoulder complaints in swimmers. Therefore, a specific prevention or rehabilitation protocol for surfers is required. Decreased thoracic extension may thereby alter the risk of scapular dyskinesis and hence increase the risk of impingement around the shoulder joint. A potential physiotherapeutic prevention programme should address all these aspects, with the main goal being to increase external rotator strength and to stretch the internal rotators.There is a high incidence of chronic surf-induced shoulder complaints in surfers. Symptoms may arise due to imbalanced training or scapular dyskinesis, which may subsequently trigger subacromial pain. Physiotherapeutic prevention should include stretching of the internal rotators, external rotator training and optimisation of thoracic extension and scapulothoracic movement.

steps: This article provides an overview of the current literature, proposes a potential pathogenesis and a potential physiotherapeutic prevention program for surf-induced shoulder complaints.A systematic review was performed considering the Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses (PRISMA) guidelines for articles regarding kinematic analysis of the surf paddling movement

We included case series and cohort studies that originally studied or described the paddle movement made by wave surfers, studies that reported on kinesiologic analysis with nerve conduction studies and studies on 3D motion analysis of the shoulder while paddling.Eight original articles were included that analysed the shoulder movement in paddling surfers

A potential physiotherapeutic prevention programme should address all these aspects, with the main goal being to increase external rotator strength and to stretch the internal rotators.There is a high incidence of chronic surf-induced shoulder complaints in surfers
Physiotherapeutic prevention should include stretching of the internal rotators, external rotator training and optimisation of thoracic extension and scapulothoracic movement.

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 스트레칭 프로토콜은 내부 회전근의 스트레칭, 외부 회전근의 강화 훈련, 흉부 확장 최적화 및 견갑흉부 운동 개선을 포함해야 한다.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 논문에서는 서핑 중 팔을 젓는 동작에서 외부 회전근의 힘이 감소하고, 내부 회전근의 긴장이 증가하여 만성 어깨 통증이 발생할 수 있음을 설명한다. 따라서, 내부 회전근의 스트레칭과 외부 회전근의 강화가 필요하다고 제안한다.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 서핑을 하는 사람들로, 만성 어깨 통증을 호소하는 경우에 적용된다.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양발을 어깨너비로 벌리고, 팔을 몸 옆에 자연스럽게 두고 서 있는 자세.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 천천히 옆으로 들어 올리며 어깨 높이에 맞춘다.
2단계: 팔을 어깨 높이에서 앞으로 쭉 뻗으며 손바닥이 아래를 향하도록 한다.
3단계: 팔을 뒤로 젖히며 가슴을 앞으로 내민다. 이때 어깨가 뒤로 젖혀지는 느낌을 느낀다.
4단계: 팔을 다시 앞으로 가져오며 내부 회전근이 늘어나는 것을 느낀다.
5단계: 팔을 천천히 내리며 원래 자세로 돌아온다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 어깨와 가슴 부위가 늘어나는 느낌과 함께 긴장이 풀리는 것을 느껴야 한다.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울 앞에서 자신의 자세를 확인하며 어깨가 일직선이 되도록 한다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 불편함을 느끼지 않는 선에서 강도를 조절
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 1단계부터 시작하여 점진적으로 5단계까지 진행

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 장시간 앉아 있는 경우, 정기적으로 스트레칭을 실시하여 긴장을 완화.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 일상적인 활동 중 짧은 휴식 시간을 이용해 스트레칭을 통합.

exercises.title: Both the resistance training session and the static stretching after exercise does not affect the pectoralis major stiffness of well-trained men.
exercises.abstract: Previous evidence suggests the intense resistance training session can increase the muscle hardness, while stretching protocols with high intensity and volume can decrease it. However, it remains unknown the effects of an exercise and a less intensive stretching maneuver on muscle stiffness of well-trained men. Herein we (i) analyze the acute effects of heavy bench press exercise on the pectoralis major muscle shear modulus of well-trained men and (ii) assess the effectiveness of a 1-min stretching maneuver applied on this muscle after the exercise using shear wave elastography. Fourteen participants performed three sets of bench press from 8 to 13 repetitions maximum. Immediately after the exercise, their right shoulder was passively stretched for 1 min (stretched side) while their left arm stayed relaxed along the side of the body (control side). Elastographic images were acquired for the pectoralis major mid-region of both sides before the exercise, immediately after the intervention and after 5 min of rest. Our results revealed that both the bench press exercise and the static stretching does not affect the pectoralis major shear modulus of well-trained men. Conversely, the shear modulus significantly decreased at 5 min after intervention with respect to immediately after, for both the stretched (from 5.52 to 4.29 kPa) and the control sides (from 5.87 to 4.56 kPa). Therefore, both resistance training session and 1-min static stretching were not sufficient to significantly change the pectoralis major muscle stiffness of well-trained men.Copyright © 2020 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

steps: Previous evidence suggests the intense resistance training session can increase the muscle hardness, while stretching protocols with high intensity and volume can decrease it
However, it remains unknown the effects of an exercise and a less intensive stretching maneuver on muscle stiffness of well-trained men

Herein we (i) analyze the acute effects of heavy bench press exercise on the pectoralis major muscle shear modulus of well-trained men and (ii) assess the effectiveness of a 1-min stretching maneuver applied on this muscle after the exercise using shear wave elastography
Immediately after the exercise, their right shoulder was passively stretched for 1 min (stretched side) while their left arm stayed relaxed along the side of the body (control side)
Elastographic images were acquired for the pectoralis major mid-region of both sides before the exercise, immediately after the intervention and after 5 min of rest
Our results revealed that both the bench press exercise and the static stretching does not affect the pectoralis major shear modulus of well-trained men

Conversely, the shear modulus significantly decreased at 5 min after intervention with respect to immediately after, for both the stretched (from 5.52 to 4.29 kPa) and the control sides (from 5.87 to 4.56 kPa)

Therefore, both resistance training session and 1-min static stretching were not sufficient to significantly change the pectoralis major muscle stiffness of well-trained men.Copyright © 2020 Elsevier Ltd

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근을 대상으로 한 1분간의 정적 스트레칭을 실시하여 운동 후 근육 경직도 변화를 평가함.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 벤치 프레스 운동과 1분간의 정적 스트레칭이 대흉근의 경직도에 유의미한 영향을 미치지 않았으며, 5분 후에는 경직도가 감소함.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 잘 훈련된 남성 14명을 대상으로 하여, 벤치 프레스 운동 후 대흉근의 경직도를 측정함.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양팔을 몸 옆에 두고 서서 오른쪽 팔을 스트레칭할 준비를 함.
동작_단계: 1단계: 오른쪽 팔을 천천히 옆으로 들어올리며 어깨 높이까지 올림.
2단계: 팔을 수평으로 유지하며 오른쪽 팔꿈치를 구부림.
3단계: 왼손으로 오른쪽 팔꿈치를 잡고 부드럽게 왼쪽으로 당김.
4단계: 오른쪽 어깨가 늘어나는 느낌을 느끼며 1분간 유지.
5단계: 스트레칭 후 팔을 천천히 내리고 원래 자세로 돌아옴.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 어깨와 가슴 부위의 부드러운 긴장감과 스트레칭 느낌.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 통해 팔의 위치와 어깨의 정렬을 확인.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 느끼는 긴장감을 기준으로 조절.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자: 1회 30초 → 중급자: 1회 1분 → 고급자: 1회 1분 30초

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 업무 중 짧은 휴식 시간을 이용하여 스트레칭 실시.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중간에 1분 스트레칭을 포함하여 긴장 완화.

exercises.title: Effectiveness of stretching exercise versus kinesiotaping in improving length of the pectoralis minor: A systematic review and network meta-analysis.
exercises.abstract: Shortness of the pectoralis minor (PM) is a potential mechanism underlying shoulder impingement syndrome. Few studies have examined the effects of kinesiotaping and stretching exercise on PM length or index. This systematic review and network meta-analysis investigated the effects of stretching exercise and kinesiotaping on PM length and index in adults.This study followed Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses guidelines. Randomised controlled trials including adults with or without symptomatic shoulders were included. Heterogeneity between studies was assessed using I2 statistics, and publication bias was evaluated by constructing a funnel plot.We extracted data from six randomised controlled trials that included 263 participants (age range: 18-50 years). Compared with usual care, kinesiotaping resulted in greater improvement in PM length (mean difference, 1.15 cm; 95% confidence interval [CI]: 0.20-2.10 cm). Compared with usual care and kinesiotaping, proprioceptive neuromuscular facilitation (PNF) stretching increased PMI significantly, with a mean difference of 1.40 (95% CI: 1.17-1.63) and 1.08 (95% CI: 0.29-1.87) cm, respectively.Compared with no intervention, kinesiotaping is beneficial for lengthening the PM. Intervention with static stretching alone has no effect on PM length. Compared with kinesiotaping alone and no intervention, PNF stretching increases PMI.Copyright © 2019 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

steps: Few studies have examined the effects of kinesiotaping and stretching exercise on PM length or index

This systematic review and network meta-analysis investigated the effects of stretching exercise and kinesiotaping on PM length and index in adults.This study followed Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses guidelines

Compared with usual care and kinesiotaping, proprioceptive neuromuscular facilitation (PNF) stretching increased PMI significantly, with a mean difference of 1.40 (95% CI: 1.17-1.63) and 1.08 (95% CI: 0.29-1.87) cm, respectively.Compared with no intervention, kinesiotaping is beneficial for lengthening the PM
Intervention with static stretching alone has no effect on PM length
Compared with kinesiotaping alone and no intervention, PNF stretching increases PMI.Copyright © 2019 Elsevier Ltd

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 이 논문에서는 대흉근의 단축을 개선하기 위해 스트레칭 운동과 키네시오 테이핑의 효과를 비교하였으며, PNF 스트레칭이 대흉근 길이를 유의미하게 증가시킨다고 보고하였다.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: PNF 스트레칭은 대흉근 길이를 1.40cm 증가시키며, 키네시오 테이핑은 1.15cm 증가시키는 효과가 있음. 정적 스트레칭은 대흉근 길이에 영향을 미치지 않음.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 18세에서 50세 사이의 성인으로, 증상이 있는 경우와 없는 경우 모두 포함됨.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양발을 어깨너비로 벌리고, 팔을 자연스럽게 옆으로 늘어뜨린 자세.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 천천히 위로 들어올리며, 손바닥이 서로 마주 보게 함.
2단계: 팔을 위로 올리는 동시에 가슴을 앞으로 밀어내며 스트레칭.
3단계: 팔을 옆으로 벌리며 가슴을 활짝 열어줌.
4단계: 팔을 다시 위로 올리며, 가슴을 더욱 앞으로 밀어내는 동작 반복.
5단계: 마지막으로 팔을 천천히 내리며, 가슴을 수축시키는 느낌을 유지.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 가슴과 어깨 부위에서의 긴장감과 스트레칭 느낌.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 보며 팔과 가슴의 위치를 확인하여 올바른 자세 유지.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 강도를 조절하기 위해 팔을 올리는 높이를 조절하거나, 가슴을 앞으로 밀어내는 힘을 조절함.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 기본 동작부터 시작하여 점차적으로 강도를 높여 고급자 수준으로 진행.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 장시간 앉아있는 경우, 정기적으로 스트레칭을 통해 긴장을 완화.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중간중간 스트레칭 시간을 가지며, 일상에서 자주 팔을 위로 올리는 동작을 포함.

exercises.title: Acute Effects of Pectoralis Minor Self-Mobilization on Shoulder Motion and Posture: A Blinded and Randomized Placebo-Controlled Study in Asymptomatic Individuals.
exercises.abstract: Tightness of the pectoralis minor is a common characteristic that has been associated with aberrant posture and shoulder pathology. Determining conservative treatment techniques for maintaining and lengthening this muscle is critical. Although some gross stretching techniques have been proven effective, there are currently no empirical data regarding the effectiveness of self-myofascial release for treating tightness of this muscle.To determine the acute effectiveness of a self-myofascial release with movement technique of the pectoralis minor for improving shoulder motion and posture among asymptomatic individuals.Randomized controlled trial.Orthopedic rehabilitation clinic.A total of 21 physically active, college-aged individuals without shoulder pain volunteered to participate in this study.Glenohumeral internal rotation, external rotation, and flexion range of motion (ROM), pectoralis minor length, and forward scapular posture were measured in all participants. The intervention group received one application of a self-soft-tissue mobilization of the pectoralis minor with movement. The placebo group completed the same motions as the intervention group, but with minimal pressure applied to the xiphoid process. Separate analyses of covariance were used to determine differences between groups (P < .05).Separate analyses of covariance showed that the self-mobilization group had significantly more flexion ROM, pectoralis minor length, and less forward scapular posture posttest than the placebo group. However, the difference in forward scapular posture may not be clinically significant. No differences were found between groups for external or internal rotation ROM.The results of this study indicate that an acute self-myofascial release with movement is effective for improving glenohumeral flexion ROM and pectoralis minor length, and may assist with forward scapular posture. Clinicians should consider this self-mobilization in the prevention and rehabilitation of pathologies associated with shortness of the pectoralis minor.

steps: Although some gross stretching techniques have been proven effective, there are currently no empirical data regarding the effectiveness of self-myofascial release for treating tightness of this muscle.To determine the acute effectiveness of a self-myofascial release with movement technique of the pectoralis minor for improving shoulder motion and posture among asymptomatic individuals.Randomized controlled trial.Orthopedic rehabilitation clinic.A total of 21 physically active, college-aged individuals without shoulder pain volunteered to participate in this study.Glenohumeral internal rotation, external rotation, and flexion range of motion (ROM), pectoralis minor length, and forward scapular posture were measured in all participants
The intervention group received one application of a self-soft-tissue mobilization of the pectoralis minor with movement

No differences were found between groups for external or internal rotation ROM.The results of this study indicate that an acute self-myofascial release with movement is effective for improving glenohumeral flexion ROM and pectoralis minor length, and may assist with forward scapular posture

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근의 자가 근막 이완 기법을 사용하여 어깨 운동과 자세를 개선하는 방법.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 자가 근막 이완 기법이 대흉근의 유연성을 증가시키고 어깨의 굴곡 범위를 개선하는 데 효과적이라는 연구 결과.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 어깨 통증이 없는 신체 활동이 활발한 대학생 21명.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 편안한 자세로 서거나 앉아 팔을 자연스럽게 늘어뜨린다.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 옆으로 벌리고 손바닥이 하늘을 향하도록 한다.
2단계: 팔을 천천히 위로 올리면서 어깨를 긴장시키지 않도록 주의한다.
3단계: 팔을 위로 올린 상태에서 5초간 유지한다.
4단계: 팔을 천천히 내리면서 호흡을 깊게 한다.
5단계: 이 과정을 3회 반복하며 각 반복 후 잠시 휴식한다.
호흡_패턴: 5단계: 반복 후 깊게 숨을 쉬며 휴식한다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 어깨와 가슴 부위의 이완과 스트레칭을 느껴야 한다.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 통해 팔의 위치와 자세를 확인하며 올바른 자세를 유지한다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 불편함이 느껴지지 않는 범위에서 강도를 조절한다.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자: 기본 동작 → 중급자: 동작의 속도와 범위 증가 → 고급자: 추가 저항을 사용한 스트레칭

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 앉아 있는 동안 주기적으로 스트레칭을 실시하여 긴장을 완화한다.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중 짧은 휴식 시간을 이용해 스트레칭을 통합한다.

수행_시_주의점: 자세를 유지하는 동안 호흡을 잊지 않는다.

exercises.title: Comparison of the effects of pectoralis muscles stretching exercise and scapular retraction strengthening exercise on forward shoulder.
exercises.abstract: [Purpose] The purpose of this study was to compare effect in a group of stretching and a group of muscle strengthening exercise for patients with forward scapular posture. [Subjects and Methods] This study was performed in 20 subjects who defined to the forward shoulder posture. The subjects were divided into a group of pectoralis muscles stretching and a group of muscle strength exercise for scapular retraction. [Results] The forward shoulder posture of the group of the scapular retraction exercise was significantly decreased when compared to that of the group of the pectoralis muscles stretching. [Conclusion] It is expected that therapeutic effect can be improved and the period can be shortened when strength exercise for forward shoulder posture is applied as a therapeutic intervention.

steps: [Purpose] The purpose of this study was to compare effect in a group of stretching and a group of muscle strengthening exercise for patients with forward scapular posture
The subjects were divided into a group of pectoralis muscles stretching and a group of muscle strength exercise for scapular retraction
[Results] The forward shoulder posture of the group of the scapular retraction exercise was significantly decreased when compared to that of the group of the pectoralis muscles stretching
[Conclusion] It is expected that therapeutic effect can be improved and the period can be shortened when strength exercise for forward shoulder posture is applied as a therapeutic intervention.

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근 스트레칭과 견갑골 후퇴 근력 강화 운동의 효과를 비교하여, 대흉근 스트레칭 그룹과 견갑골 후퇴 운동 그룹의 전방 어깨 자세 변화를 관찰하였다.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 견갑골 후퇴 운동 그룹의 전방 어깨 자세가 대흉근 스트레칭 그룹에 비해 유의미하게 감소하였으며, 이는 근력 운동이 치료적 개입으로서 효과적임을 시사한다.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 전방 어깨 자세를 가진 20명의 피험자를 대상으로 하였다.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양팔을 양옆으로 벌리고, 어깨를 편안하게 내린 상태에서 서거나 앉는다.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 천천히 위로 올리며 가슴을 펴고, 대흉근의 긴장을 느낀다.
2단계: 팔을 뒤로 젖히며 견갑골을 서로 가까이 붙인다.
3단계: 이 상태에서 15초간 유지하며, 가슴과 어깨의 스트레칭을 느낀다.
4단계: 팔을 원래 위치로 천천히 내리며 호흡을 깊게 한다.
5단계: 반복하기 전에 잠시 휴식을 취하며, 스트레칭의 효과를 느낀다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 가슴과 어깨 부위에서의 긴장감과 이완감을 느껴야 한다.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 보며 어깨가 편안하게 내려가고 있는지 확인한다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 느껴지는 긴장감을 기준으로 조절한다.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자 → 중급자 → 고급자 진행 경로

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 정기적으로 스트레칭을 통해 자세를 교정한다.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중간에 짧은 스트레칭 시간을 포함시킨다.

수행_시_주의점: 스트레칭 전 충분한 준비 운동을 한다.

exercises.title: Scapular kinematic alterations during arm elevation with decrease in pectoralis minor stiffness after stretching in healthy individuals.
exercises.abstract: Pectoralis minor tightness may be seen in individuals with scapular dyskinesis, and stretching is used for the treatment of altered scapular motion in sports and clinical fields. However, few researchers have reported on the effects of pectoralis minor stiffness on scapular motion during arm elevation. This study investigated whether an acute decrease of pectoralis minor stiffness after stretching changes the scapular motion during arm elevation.The study allocated 15 dominant and 15 nondominant upper limbs in healthy men as control and interventional limbs, respectively. In the intervention limb group, the shoulder was passively and horizontally abducted at 150° of elevation for 5 minutes to stretch the pectoralis minor muscle. Before and after stretching, an electromagnetic sensor was used to examine 3-dimensional scapular motion during abduction and scaption. Ultrasonic shear wave elastography was used to measure pectoralis minor stiffness before and immediately after stretching and after arm elevation.In the interventional limb, pectoralis minor stiffness decreased by 3.2 kPa immediately after stretching and by 2.5 kPa after arm elevation. The maximal changes in scapular kinematics after stretching were 4.8° of external rotation and 3.3° of posterior tilt in abduction, and 4.5° of external rotation and 3.7° of posterior tilt in scaption. Upward rotation in abduction or scaption did not change.Stretching for the pectoralis minor muscle increases external rotation and posterior tilt of the scapula during arm elevation.Copyright © 2018 Journal of Shoulder and Elbow Surgery Board of Trustees. Published by Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.

This study investigated whether an acute decrease of pectoralis minor stiffness after stretching changes the scapular motion during arm elevation.The study allocated 15 dominant and 15 nondominant upper limbs in healthy men as control and interventional limbs, respectively
In the intervention limb group, the shoulder was passively and horizontally abducted at 150° of elevation for 5 minutes to stretch the pectoralis minor muscle
Before and after stretching, an electromagnetic sensor was used to examine 3-dimensional scapular motion during abduction and scaption

Ultrasonic shear wave elastography was used to measure pectoralis minor stiffness before and immediately after stretching and after arm elevation.In the interventional limb, pectoralis minor stiffness decreased by 3.2 kPa immediately after stretching and by 2.5 kPa after arm elevation

The maximal changes in scapular kinematics after stretching were 4.8° of external rotation and 3.3° of posterior tilt in abduction, and 4.5° of external rotation and 3.7° of posterior tilt in scaption

Upward rotation in abduction or scaption did not change.Stretching for the pectoralis minor muscle increases external rotation and posterior tilt of the scapula during arm elevation.Copyright © 2018 Journal of Shoulder and Elbow Surgery Board of Trustees

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근의 긴장을 완화하기 위해 어깨를 수동적으로 수평으로 150°까지 외전하여 5분간 스트레칭하는 방법.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 스트레칭 후 대흉근의 경직도가 감소하며, 이는 어깨의 외회전과 후방 기울기를 증가시켜 팔을 들어올릴 때 견갑골의 움직임을 개선한다.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 건강한 남성으로, 15개의 지배적인 팔과 15개의 비지배적인 팔을 대상으로 하여 실험이 진행되었다.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양팔을 옆으로 벌리고, 팔꿈치를 약간 구부린 상태에서 어깨를 편안하게 유지한다.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 수평으로 벌린 상태에서 시작한다.
2단계: 한쪽 팔을 수동적으로 150°까지 외전한다.
3단계: 팔을 외전한 상태에서 5분간 유지한다.
4단계: 팔을 원래 위치로 되돌린다.
5단계: 반대쪽 팔로 동일한 동작을 반복한다.
호흡_패턴: 2단계: 팔을 외전할 때 깊게 숨을 들이킨다.
3단계: 팔을 유지하는 동안 숨을 천천히 내쉰다.
4단계: 팔을 원래 위치로 되돌릴 때 숨을 들이킨다.
5단계: 반대쪽 팔을 외전할 때 깊게 숨을 들이킨다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 어깨와 가슴 부위에서의 스트레칭 감각과 함께 가벼운 긴장감을 느껴야 한다.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 사용하여 팔의 위치와 어깨의 정렬을 확인하며, 팔이 수평을 유지하는지 점검한다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 느끼는 긴장감에 따라 조절하며, 통증이 느껴지지 않도록 주의한다.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 1세트부터 시작하여 익숙해지면 2세트로 증가한다.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 정기적으로 스트레칭 시간을 갖고, 작업 중간에 짧은 휴식을 통해 스트레칭을 포함시킨다.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 일상적인 활동 중에 짧은 스트레칭 시간을 포함시켜 근육 긴장을 완화한다.

수행_시_주의점: 스트레칭 시 과도한 힘을 주지 않는다.

exercises.title: Immediate effects of respiratory muscle stretching on chest wall kinematics and electromyography in COPD patients.
exercises.abstract: This study evaluated the immediate effects of respiratory muscle stretching on chest wall kinematics and electromyographic activity in COPD patients. 28 patients with COPD were randomized into two groups: 14 to the treatment group (TG) and 14 to the control group (CG). The TG underwent a stretching protocol of the rib cage muscles, while the CG remained at rest under similar conditions. After a single session, TG increased the tidal volume of the pulmonary rib cage (Vrcp) (p=0.020) and tidal volume of abdominal rib cage (Vrca) (p=0.043) variations and their percentages in relation to the thoracic wall, Vrcp% (p=0.044) and Vrca% (p=0.022). Also, TG decreased the end-expiratory Vrcp (p=0.013) and the end-inspiratory Vrcp (p=0.011) variations. In addition, there was a reduction in respiratory rate (RR) (p=0.011) and minute volume (MV) (p=0.035), as well as an increase in expiratory time (Te) (p=0.026). There was also an immediate reduction in sternocleidomastoid (p=0.043) and upper trapezium (p=0.034) muscle electrical activity. Then, the study supports the use of stretching to improve COPD chest wall mobility with positive effects on chest wall mechanics, on volume distribution and electromyography.Copyright © 2017 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.

steps: This study evaluated the immediate effects of respiratory muscle stretching on chest wall kinematics and electromyographic activity in COPD patients
The TG underwent a stretching protocol of the rib cage muscles, while the CG remained at rest under similar conditions

Then, the study supports the use of stretching to improve COPD chest wall mobility with positive effects on chest wall mechanics, on volume distribution and electromyography.Copyright © 2017 Elsevier B.V

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: COPD 환자들을 대상으로 한 호흡 근육 스트레칭 프로토콜로, 흉곽 근육의 스트레칭을 포함.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 스트레칭이 COPD 환자의 흉곽 운동성과 근전도 활동에 긍정적인 영향을 미친다는 연구 결과에 기반.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 28명의 COPD 환자를 대상으로 하여, 14명은 스트레칭 그룹, 14명은 대조군으로 나누어 진행.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 편안한 자세로 서거나 앉아 양팔을 옆으로 자연스럽게 늘어뜨린다.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 천천히 옆으로 들어올리며 흉곽을 확장한다.
2단계: 팔을 위로 올리면서 깊게 숨을 들이킨다.
3단계: 팔을 천천히 옆으로 내리며 숨을 내쉰다.
4단계: 팔을 다시 들어올리며 흉곽을 최대한 확장한다.
5단계: 팔을 내리며 흉곽을 수축시키고, 깊게 숨을 내쉰다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 흉곽의 확장과 수축을 느끼며, 근육의 긴장이 완화되는 것을 느껴야 한다.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 통해 팔의 위치와 흉곽의 움직임을 확인한다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 불편함을 느끼지 않을 정도로 조절
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 1단계부터 시작하여 점차 5단계까지 진행

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 업무 중간중간 스트레칭 시간을 가지며, 자세를 자주 바꾼다.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 일상적인 활동 중 짧은 스트레칭 시간을 포함시킨다.

exercises.title: Effect of Thoracic Correction Exercises in Upper Body Dysfunction of 94-Year-old Male Participant - A Case Report.
exercises.abstract: The case report has been presented to show the effects of thoracic correction exercises on flexed posture in older men with upper body dysfunction using posture analysis software and pectoralis minor muscle length test. The present case is that of a 94-year-old male. He was guided for a specific thoracic correction exercises for 12 weeks. The program included breathing correction, thorax mobility, scapular stability and passive stretching of Pectoralis major and minor, performed thrice a week, 30 min each session, for 12 weeks. Outcome measures included the upper body dysfunction changes by posture analysis software and pectoralis minor muscle length test. The Pre and Post-test of the patient demonstrated significantly greater improvements in hyperkyphosis (forward head posture) and pectoralis minor muscle length. This case study provides a promising exercise intervention that may improve flexed posture in older men with age-related upper body dysfunction.

steps: The case report has been presented to show the effects of thoracic correction exercises on flexed posture in older men with upper body dysfunction using posture analysis software and pectoralis minor muscle length test
He was guided for a specific thoracic correction exercises for 12 weeks
The program included breathing correction, thorax mobility, scapular stability and passive stretching of Pectoralis major and minor, performed thrice a week, 30 min each session, for 12 weeks
This case study provides a promising exercise intervention that may improve flexed posture in older men with age-related upper body dysfunction.

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 94세 남성을 대상으로 한 흉부 교정 운동이 상체 기능 장애에 미치는 영향을 분석한 사례 보고서로, 12주 동안 특정 흉부 교정 운동을 실시하였으며, 호흡 교정, 흉부 이동성, 견갑 안정성 및 대흉근과 소흉근의 수동 스트레칭을 포함.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 사례 연구 결과, 흉부 교정 운동이 고령 남성의 과도한 굴곡 자세와 소흉근 길이에 유의미한 개선을 가져왔다.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 94세 남성, 상체 기능 장애를 가진 고령자.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 편안하게 서거나 앉은 자세로, 척추를 곧게 펴고 어깨를 자연스럽게 내린 상태.
동작_단계: 1단계: 두 팔을 옆으로 벌리고 손바닥을 위로 향하게 한다.
2단계: 깊게 숨을 들이마시며 팔을 천천히 위로 올린다.
3단계: 숨을 내쉬며 팔을 옆으로 내리고 어깨를 아래로 내린다.
4단계: 팔을 앞으로 모으고 가슴을 앞으로 밀어준다.
5단계: 다시 깊게 숨을 들이마시며 팔을 위로 올리고 반복한다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 어깨와 가슴의 긴장이 풀리고, 상체가 편안하게 늘어나는 느낌.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 통해 어깨가 자연스럽게 내려가고 있는지 확인.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 불편함을 느끼지 않을 정도로 조절.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 기본 동작부터 시작하고, 익숙해지면 강도를 높여간다.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 장시간 앉아 있는 경우, 정기적으로 스트레칭을 실시하여 자세를 교정.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 일상적인 활동 중 짧은 시간에 스트레칭을 통합하여 실시.

exercises.title: Change of pectoralis minor length, and acromial distance, during scapular retraction at 60° shoulder elevation.
exercises.abstract: As the pectoralis minor muscle is inserted into the coracoid process, an improper length of this muscle would affect scapular and shoulder motions. Therefore, this study is proposed to assess the effects on pectoralis minor's length and acromial distance after active scapular retraction in scaption at 60° elevation. Sixty right-hand-dominant participants (11 males, 49 females) were randomized into an intervention group and a control group. The intervention group performed pectoralis minor muscle stretching by active scapular retraction, while the control group were asked to sit in an upright position. The result shows that, the mean lengths of pectoralis minor in the intervention group were significantly increased when compared with those of the control group (p = 0.004 and p = 0.014 respectively). Simultaneously, the reduction in acromial distance of this intervention group was substantially greater than the control group's (p < 0.001 and p = 0.001 respectively). However, it should be noted that the results reported only relate to the period immediately following muscle stretching.Copyright © 2016 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

steps: The intervention group performed pectoralis minor muscle stretching by active scapular retraction, while the control group were asked to sit in an upright position
However, it should be noted that the results reported only relate to the period immediately following muscle stretching.Copyright © 2016 Elsevier Ltd

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근의 길이를 증가시키기 위해 능동적인 견갑골 후퇴를 통해 스트레칭을 수행하는 방법.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 대흉근의 길이가 증가하고 견봉 간 거리가 감소하는 효과가 있으며, 이는 어깨와 견갑골의 운동에 긍정적인 영향을 미친다.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 60명의 우세한 오른손 사용자를 대상으로 하였으며, 남성 11명, 여성 49명으로 구성된 실험군과 대조군이 포함되었다.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 의자에 앉아 등을 곧게 펴고 어깨를 편안하게 내린다.
동작_단계: 1단계: 양팔을 옆으로 자연스럽게 늘어뜨린다.
2단계: 어깨를 뒤로 젖히고 가슴을 앞으로 내민다.
3단계: 양팔을 앞으로 뻗으며 견갑골을 서로 가까이 당긴다.
4단계: 이 자세를 유지하며 가슴을 열어준다.
5단계: 5초 동안 이 자세를 유지한 후 원래 자세로 돌아온다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 가슴과 어깨 부위에서 스트레칭의 느낌을 느껴야 하며, 불편함이 없어야 한다.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 통해 어깨가 수평을 이루고 있는지 확인하며, 가슴이 앞으로 나와 있는지 체크한다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 불편함이 느껴지지 않는 범위 내에서 강도를 조절한다.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 5초 유지 후 1회 반복, 고급자는 10초 유지 후 2회 반복.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 장시간 앉아 있는 환경에서 정기적으로 스트레칭을 실시하여 근육 긴장을 완화한다.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중간중간에 스트레칭 시간을 가지며, 매시간마다 5분씩 스트레칭을 포함한다.

exercises.title: Stretching Exercises for Subacromial Impingement Syndrome: Effects of 6-Week Program on Shoulder Tightness, Pain, and Disability Status.
exercises.abstract: Increasing soft tissue flexibility and joint mobility is one of the important aims of studies to treat subacromial impingement syndrome (SIS).The aim of this study was to investigate the effects of a stretching program on posterior capsule tightness, pectoralis minor tightness, pain severity, and disability status in SIS.Single-group pretest posttest design.University outpatient clinic.18 participants diagnosed with SIS (34.8±9.4 y, symptoms duration 5.8±4.9 months) were included in the study.The 6-week self-stretching program for pectoralis minor, posterior capsule, levator scapula, and latissimus dorsi was performed.Posterior capsule tightness, pectoralis minor tightness, pain severity (visual analog scale), and self-reported shoulder-related pain and disability status (Shoulder Pain and Disability Index) were used to assess changes in flexibility and symptoms.Comparisons showed that there was significantly less posterior capsule and pectoralis minor tightness, less pain severity on activity and at night, and a lower disability score reported after the 6-week stretching program (P 0.05).The findings of the study showed that flexibility, pain severity, and disability gains can be achieved with a 6-week stretching exercise training for participants with SIS. Therefore, shoulder girdle stretching exercises should be recommended early in shoulder rehabilitation program.

steps: Increasing soft tissue flexibility and joint mobility is one of the important aims of studies to treat subacromial impingement syndrome (SIS).The aim of this study was to investigate the effects of a stretching program on posterior capsule tightness, pectoralis minor tightness, pain severity, and disability status in SIS.Single-group pretest posttest design.University outpatient clinic.18 participants diagnosed with SIS (34.8±9.4 y, symptoms duration 5.8±4.9 months) were included in the study.The 6-week self-stretching program for pectoralis minor, posterior capsule, levator scapula, and latissimus dorsi was performed.Posterior capsule tightness, pectoralis minor tightness, pain severity (visual analog scale), and self-reported shoulder-related pain and disability status (Shoulder Pain and Disability Index) were used to assess changes in flexibility and symptoms.Comparisons showed that there was significantly less posterior capsule and pectoralis minor tightness, less pain severity on activity and at night, and a lower disability score reported after the 6-week stretching program (P 0.05).The findings of the study showed that flexibility, pain severity, and disability gains can be achieved with a 6-week stretching exercise training for participants with SIS
Therefore, shoulder girdle stretching exercises should be recommended early in shoulder rehabilitation program.

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 6주간의 자가 스트레칭 프로그램으로 대흉근, 후방 캡슐, 승모근, 광배근을 대상으로 하여 유연성 및 통증 감소를 목표로 함.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 이 연구는 스트레칭 프로그램이 후방 캡슐 및 대흉근의 긴장을 줄이고, 활동 중 및 야간의 통증을 감소시키며, 장애 점수를 낮추는 데 효과적임을 보여줌.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 18명의 SIS 진단을 받은 참가자(34.8±9.4세, 증상 지속 기간 5.8±4.9개월)로 구성됨.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 어깨를 편안하게 하고, 양팔을 옆으로 늘어뜨린 상태에서 서거나 앉기.
동작_단계: 양팔을 천천히 위로 들어 올리며, 어깨를 귀 쪽으로 올리지 않도록 주의.
팔을 뒤로 젖히며 가슴을 앞으로 내밀어 대흉근을 늘림.
양팔을 가슴 높이에서 앞으로 쭉 뻗어 손바닥이 서로 마주 보게 함.
한쪽 팔을 가슴 앞으로 교차시키고, 다른 팔로 팔꿈치를 잡아당겨 스트레칭.
마지막으로 양팔을 머리 위로 올리고, 몸을 좌우로 기울여 측면 스트레칭.
호흡_패턴: 팔을 올릴 때 숨을 들이쉬고, 내릴 때 숨을 내쉼.
가슴을 앞으로 내밀 때 숨을 들이쉬고, 팔을 뒤로 젖힐 때 숨을 내쉼.
팔을 앞으로 뻗을 때 숨을 들이쉬고, 팔꿈치를 잡아당길 때 숨을 내쉼.
팔을 교차시킬 때 숨을 들이쉬고, 잡아당길 때 숨을 내쉼.
몸을 기울일 때 숨을 들이쉬고, 원래 자세로 돌아올 때 숨을 내쉼.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 어깨와 가슴 부위의 긴장이 풀리며, 스트레칭하는 부위에서 가벼운 긴장감을 느껴야 함.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 사용하여 팔과 어깨의 위치를 확인하고, 올바른 자세를 유지하도록 함.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 강도를 조절하기 위해 통증이 느껴지지 않는 범위 내에서 진행.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 기본 동작부터 시작하고, 점진적으로 고급 동작으로 진행.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 정기적으로 스트레칭을 하여 긴장을 풀고, 올바른 자세를 유지하도록 함.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 업무 중 짧은 휴식 시간을 이용해 스트레칭을 통합.

금기사항: 어깨 관절 수술 후 회복 중인 경우
수행_시_주의점: 스트레칭 시 호흡을 멈추지 않도록 주의.

통증_강도별_권장_변형.7-10: 전문가의 도움을 받아 수정된 동작 수행

exercises.title: Effects of scapulothoracic exercises on chest mobility, respiratory muscle strength, and pulmonary function in male COPD patients with forward shoulder posture: A randomized controlled trial.
exercises.abstract: Background The postural abnormality, forward shoulder posture (FSP), is the most common cause of respiratory impairment in older individuals with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). A recent study found that performing pectoral stretching and scapular strengthening exercises for eight weeks could reduce FSP in healthy participants. We aimed to determine the effects of pectoral stretching and scapular stabilizer strengthening exercises on FSP, chest wall mobility, respiratory muscle strength, and pulmonary function in male patients with COPD. Methods This study was randomized clinical trial. Forty male COPD patients with FSP aged 60-90 years were included and randomly allocated to control (n=20) and exercise (n=20) groups. Following completion of the scapulothoracic exercises (three days/week, for eight weeks), respiratory functions were assessed by measuring the magnitude of FSP, chest mobility, respiratory muscle strength, and pulmonary functions. Results FSP and thoracic kyphosis angle significantly decreased compared to controls (p<0.001, p<0.001). Middle and lower chest mobility markedly increased (p<0.001, p<0.001) and the pectoralis minor index significantly improved (p<0.001). The strength of the lower trapezius and serratus anterior muscles significantly increased at week eight of the exercise training (p<0.003, p<0.001). There was a marked increase in maximum inspiratory pressure and maximum expiratory pressure (p<0.001, p<0.001). Conclusions The eight-week combined pectoral muscles self-stretching and serratus anterior and lower trapezius strengthening exercises could be an effective treatment and/or prevention strategy for FSP reduction, leading to improved respiratory function in male COPD patients.Copyright: © 2024 Thongchote K et al.

steps: A recent study found that performing pectoral stretching and scapular strengthening exercises for eight weeks could reduce FSP in healthy participants

We aimed to determine the effects of pectoral stretching and scapular stabilizer strengthening exercises on FSP, chest wall mobility, respiratory muscle strength, and pulmonary function in male patients with COPD
Forty male COPD patients with FSP aged 60-90 years were included and randomly allocated to control (n=20) and exercise (n=20) groups

Following completion of the scapulothoracic exercises (three days/week, for eight weeks), respiratory functions were assessed by measuring the magnitude of FSP, chest mobility, respiratory muscle strength, and pulmonary functions
The strength of the lower trapezius and serratus anterior muscles significantly increased at week eight of the exercise training (p<0.003, p<0.001)

Conclusions The eight-week combined pectoral muscles self-stretching and serratus anterior and lower trapezius strengthening exercises could be an effective treatment and/or prevention strategy for FSP reduction, leading to improved respiratory function in male COPD patients.Copyright: © 2024 Thongchote K et al.

프로토콜_분석.논문_제공_프로토콜: 대흉근 스트레칭과 견갑 안정화 근육 강화 운동을 결합하여 8주 동안 시행함.
프로토콜_분석.과학적_근거: 이 연구는 대흉근 스트레칭과 견갑 안정화 근육 강화 운동이 FSP를 감소시키고, 흉부 이동성, 호흡 근력 및 폐 기능을 개선하는 데 효과적임을 보여줌.
프로토콜_분석.대상_조건: 60-90세의 남성 COPD 환자 중 FSP가 있는 40명.

스트레칭_상세화.시작_자세: 양발을 어깨너비로 벌리고, 팔을 자연스럽게 옆으로 늘어뜨린 상태에서 서기.
동작_단계: 양팔을 천천히 옆으로 들어 올리며, 어깨를 아래로 내린다.
팔을 수평으로 유지하며, 가슴을 앞으로 밀어내듯이 스트레칭한다.
팔을 뒤로 젖히며 가슴을 열어준다.
이 상태에서 15-30초 유지한다.
천천히 원래 자세로 돌아온다.
호흡_패턴: 팔을 들어 올릴 때 숨을 들이쉰다.
팔을 수평으로 유지할 때 숨을 내쉰다.
팔을 뒤로 젖힐 때 다시 숨을 들이쉰다.
원래 자세로 돌아올 때 숨을 내쉰다.
스트레칭_상세화.느껴야_할_감각: 가슴과 어깨 부위에서 시원한 스트레칭 감각을 느껴야 하며, 통증이 느껴져서는 안 된다.
스트레칭_상세화.시각적_큐: 거울을 통해 팔의 위치와 어깨의 위치를 확인하며, 팔이 수평을 이루고 있는지 점검한다.

실행_가이드라인.강도_조절_방법: 스트레칭 시 느껴지는 감각에 따라 강도를 조절하며, 통증이 느껴지지 않는 범위 내에서 진행한다.
실행_가이드라인.진행_방식: 초보자는 1-2주간 기본 자세에 익숙해진 후, 중급자로 진행.

직업_관련성.업무_환경_적용_방법: 사무실에서 정기적으로 스트레칭 시간을 가지며, 장시간 앉아 있는 경우 중간중간 스트레칭을 실시.

생활_패턴_적합성.일상_활동_통합_방법: 일상적인 업무 중 1시간마다 스트레칭 시간을 가지도록 하여 통합.

수행_시_주의점: 스트레칭 시 호흡을 잊지 않도록 한다.

exercises.title: Efficacy of trigger point injection therapy in noncardiac chest pain: A randomized controlled trial.
exercises.abstract: This study aimed to compare the effects of trigger point injections and stretching exercises in patients with noncardiac chest pain (NCCP) associated with myofascial pain syndrome.This prospective randomized controlled trial included 50 patients with noncardiac chest pain and trigger points in the pectoralis muscles between October 2019 and June 2020. The patients were randomly assigned to receive trigger point injections into the pectoralis muscles and exercise (n=25; 15 males, 10 females; mean age: 42.8±9.2 years; range, 25 to 57 years) or only perform exercise (n=25; 11 males, 14 females; mean age: 41.8±11.2 years; range, 18 to 60 years). The primary outcome was pain intensity at the first month and three months after the first treatment session, measured using the Visual Analog Scale from 0 to 100. The secondary outcome was the Nottingham Health Profile score.Treatment with stretching exercises and trigger point injection resulted in significant pain reduction compared to stretching exercises alone, and the reduction was persistent at the three-month follow-up (p<0.001). A between-group comparison showed no significant difference in the Nottingham Health Profile (p=0.522). Complications related to the procedure or severe adverse events attributable to treatment were not reported.Trigger point injection combined with stretching exercises is an efficient treatment for noncardiac chest pain related to myofascial pain syndrome compared to exercise treatment alone.Copyright © 2024, Turkish Society of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation.
